name: Dungeon Dive (itsblen)
description:
Basic concept prototype of a roguelite dungeon diver. Take control of a mysterious cloaked character, armed with a dagger and some powerful abilities. Clear the dungeon of the fire-slinging wisps to win.

Basic controls:

WASD - Movement

Left Click, Right Click, Space, Q, R - Basic Abilities

Shift - Toggle Sprint

Escape - Pause

E - Interact/Open
